explains: v. 消灭，摧毁；涂抹，遮蔽；(从头脑中) 抹掉；盖销（尤指邮票）

sentences.en: Their warheads are enough to obliterate the world several times over.
sentences.cn: 他们的弹头足以摧毁这个世界好几次。

sentences.en: There was time enough to obliterate memories of how things once were for him.
sentences.cn: 有足够的时间来抹掉他对过去的记忆。

sentences.en: I obliterate the word with chalk.
sentences.cn: 我用粉笔把这个单词涂去了。
